game.name: 5omeday
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You have been assigned to guard a dragon girl set to be executed at the end of 5 days and have the ability to kill her instantly at any time with the push of a button in this multi-ending visual novel.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You have been assigned to guard a dragon girl set to be executed at the end of 5 days and have the ability to kill her instantly at any time with the push of a button in this multi-ending visual novel.
